sentences.en: Further up, I ran into a man dressed like an aristocrat.
sentences.cn: 我继续往上走，遇到了一位穿戴类似贵族的男人。

sentences.en: His limousine waits in the square below, watched over by pigeons and the bust of a dead aristocrat.
sentences.cn: 一群鸽子和一个逝去了的贵族的半身像一直盯着在下面广场上等着他的大轿车。

sentences.en: Gwendolen's path crosses that of Daniel Deronda, a young aristocrat of mysterious origins (even to himself).
sentences.cn: 关德琳家的路与(甚至对他自己来说)身份神秘的年轻贵族丹尼尔·德龙拉家的路交叉在一起。
